questions.question: If 6 volt zener diode is connected across 10 volt battery, what will be the voltage across zener diode?

explanations.b: Correct. Zener maintains its breakdown voltage, which is 6V.

questions.question: Which of the following statement is true?

answers.a: Zener diode is similar with ordinary diode
answers.b: Zener diode is commonly used under reverse biasing condition
answers.c: Zener diode can operate at any range of current
answers.d: Zener diode is used to rectify the signals

explanations.a: Incorrect. It differs in reverse breakdown operation.
explanations.b: Correct. Zener diodes are designed to operate in reverse bias.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Zener has a limited current range.
explanations.d: Incorrect. Rectification is done using ordinary diodes.

questions.question: What one is not required for zener voltage regulator?

answers.a: Supply voltage must be higher than Zener voltage
answers.b: A load resistance connected in parallel with the Zener diode
answers.c: A properly chosen series resistor to limit current
answers.d: A very high series resistance to completely block current
